revised_title: Investigation of Diurnal Tides in Port Leopold, North Somerset
tldr: The author investigates the diurnal tides of Port Leopold, North Somerset, using observations made during the 1848-49 Arctic expedition. By analyzing the range and time of vanishing of the diurnal tide, the author separates the effects of the sun and moon on the tides and provides insights into the behavior of diurnal tides at the equinoxes and solstices.
